workflow.name: Auto scrape X image posts & publish to Telegram with Google Sheets storage
workflow.description:
## Who‚Äôs it for

This automation template is designed for content creators, social media managers, and automation enthusiasts who want to automatically scrape X (Twitter) posts with images and publish them directly to a Telegram channel ‚Äî without writing a single line of code.

With this workflow, you can keep your Telegram community constantly updated with the latest tweets from any account. It collects, cleans, and shares content in a fully automated cycle.

 ## How It Works

- Trigger ‚Äì Start scraping from a specific X (Twitter) account using its unique ID and username.
- Fetch Data ‚Äì The workflow calls the Twitter API (or a scraping endpoint) to gather recent tweets.
- Format & Filter ‚Äì Extracts key fields (author name, username, text, URL, creation date, images, video) and keeps only tweets containing text and at least one image.
- Remove Duplicates ‚Äì Ensures no tweet is processed or posted twice.
- Save to Google Sheets ‚Äì Stores cleaned tweet data for backup and future use.
- Clean Text ‚Äì Removes unwanted links and hashtags for a polished message.
- Loop & Publish ‚Äì Sends each tweet (text + image) to your Telegram channel.
- Delay ‚Äì Waits 3 minutes between each post to prevent spamming.

## How to Use

- Enter the Twitter ID and username of the target account.
- Connect your Google Sheets account to store scraped tweets.
- Connect your Telegram bot and specify the channel for publication.
- Run the workflow ‚Äî tweets will be automatically scraped, filtered, saved, and posted to Telegram.

## Requirements

- A valid Twitter API connection or alternative scraping endpoint.
- A Google Sheet to store tweet data.
- A Telegram Bot linked to your channel.
- n8n (or any compatible automation platform) to run the workflow.

## Need help

**Contact me for consulting and support:** [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/jaures-nya-83a033270/) / [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/@jauresnya)

parameters.content: ## Enter the ID and username of the user account you want to scrape.
## It will format the data. It also filters the tweets, keeping only those that contain text and at least one image.
## Publish the tweet on your telegram channel with a wait time of 3 minutes per post

## Who‚Äôs it for

This automation template is designed for content creators, social media managers, and automation enthusiasts who want to automatically scrape X (Twitter) posts with images and publish them directly to a Telegram channel ‚Äî without writing a single line of code.

##  How it works

- Trigger: Start scraping from a specific X (Twitter) account using its ID and username.

- Fetch data: The workflow calls the Twitter API to collect recent tweets.

- Format data: Extracts fields such as author name, username, tweet text, tweet URL, tweet ID, creation date, images, and video URL.

- Filter: Keeps only tweets that contain text and at least one image.

- Remove duplicates: Ensures no repeated tweets are processed.

- Save: Stores the cleaned tweet data into a Google Sheet for backup and future use.

- Clean text: Removes unnecessary links from the tweet text before publishing.

- Loop & Publish: Iterates over the filtered tweets and sends them (text + image) to your Telegram channel.

- Delay: Waits 3 minutes between each post to avoid spamming.

##  How to use

- Enter the Twitter ID and username of the account you want to scrape.

- Connect your Google Sheets account to store the data.

- Connect your Telegram bot and channel where the posts will be published.

- Start the workflow ‚Üí tweets will be scraped, filtered, saved, and automatically published on Telegram.

##  Requirements

- A valid Twitter API connection or scraping endpoint.

- A Google Sheet for storing scraped tweets.

- A Telegram Bot connected to your channel.

- n8n or any automation tool where this workflow runs.

## ‚ùì Need help

**Contact me for consulting and support:** [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/jaures-nya-83a033270/) / [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/@jauresnya)

## Use this workflow to automates the process of scraping tweets from X (Twitter) and publishing them to a Telegram channel
### What problem is this workflow solving? / Use case
My workflow is solving the problem of automating content curation and cross-posting from Twitter to Telegram, while keeping it clean, organized, spam-free, and consistent.
